result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jeremy John Rutherford

records.addlTxt:
1:33 PM 
Defendant Jeremy John Rutherford appeared by video from the Grant County Jail.  Attorney Adam Thomas Witt in court for Jeremy John Rutherford.  Attorney Jenna L Gill in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Defendant acknowledges criminal complaint and waives formal reading.
"NOT GUILTY" entered on all counts.

Attorney Witt's motion to modify bond.
State objects the any modification at this time.

Court: Denies modification for reasons stated on the record.

Attorney Witt moves to continue for global resolution
Status conference scheduled for December 12, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
Status conference on December 12, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
Defendant shall not leave the State of Wisconsin.

9:47 AM Defendant Jeremy John Rutherford appeared by video.  Attorney Adam Thomas Witt appeared by video for Jeremy John Rutherford.  Attorney Jenna L Gill appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

D.A. Gill informs Court that there has been outstanding warrant since June, 2022.
State moves for $500.00 cash bail in each case with conditions as previously ordered. (21CM1, 21CM5, 21CM40, 21CM64)

RE:  22CM24
Atty Witt acknowledges receipt of complaint.
Court reads charging portion of complaint into the record and finds probable cause is stated for filing.
State moves for $500.00 cash bail with condition that defendant not leave the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Witt informs Court that defendant is indigent and moves for signature bond in call cases.

New address for Mr. Rutherford:  255 Water Street - Platteville, WI  53818

Court orders $500.00 cash bail in all cases with conditions as requested by the State.

22CM24 set for arraignment 10/18/22 at 1:15 p.m.

All other cases set for status 10/18/22 at 1:15 p.m.

ADDRESS INFO for Jeremy John Rutherford
Current: 255 Water Street, Platteville, WI 53818 United States  (Effective: 10-06-2022)
Prior: 2829 Sandy Hook Road, Hazel Green, WI 53811

02:39 PM
 Attorney Jenna L Gill in court for Plaintiff State of Wisconsin. Prosecuting Atty Jenna L Gill appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Adam Thomas Witt in court for Defendant Jeremy John Rutherford. Defendant Jeremy John Rutherford not in court.
  Court finds probable cause for filing.
State moves for "BODY ONLY" warrant - non appearance.
Attorney Witt argues against warrant and forfeiture.
